title: Social Energy

questions.text: After a long week, I prefer to recharge by...
choices: Going out with friends to a lively event
Having a small gathering with close friends
Spending quiet time at home alone
One-on-one time with my partner
Other / It depends

questions.text: At a party, you'll most likely find me...
choices: In the center of the room telling stories
Having deep conversations with a few people
Helping the host with tasks
Finding a quiet corner to observe
Other / It depends

questions.text: When meeting new people, I typically...
choices: Introduce myself to everyone enthusiastically
Wait for others to approach me first
Stick with people I already know
Jump right into interesting conversations
Other / It depends
Multiple social activities and plans
One fun outing and lots of rest
Staying home with a good book or show
Spontaneous adventures as they come
Other / It depends

questions.text: After spending time in a crowd, I feel...
choices: Energized and ready for more
Happy but needing some quiet time
Drained and eager to be alone
Depends on who was in the crowd
Other / It depends

description: Discover whether you're party animals or cozy homebodies.
